name: Francis & Co.
description: Get along with Ben, Jess and Lisa in their rusty but trusty van! Prepare yourself and your team for tonight's Grand Battle, where you'll be facing ... The Faceless. Interact with the locals, get to know them and their story. Help them by doing quests, they'll sure know how to reward you! Drive in the beautiful city of San Francisco. Discover the most iconic neighborhoods and places in this city full of history! Follow the summer vacation of a group of teenagers in their quest of being the best skate gang of SF! Master a variety of skateboarding tricks and use them in a fast-paced, turn-based races against your opponents! Enjoy some good ol' classics tricks, as well as satisfying & completely wacky moves! Go as fast as possible to overtake your opponents and get them off the screen! Jade BARBIER (GA 3D - Portfolio) Ylann BRAUNSCHWEIGER (GA 2D - ArtStation) Leo COMPE (GD - Portfolio) Quentin CROIZIT (GD - Portfolio) Valentin D'AUBUISSON (MS - SoundCloud) Maxime DEFOULNY (GA 3D - ArtStation) Julien DI NATALE (GD - Portfolio) Tom FAVIER (GA 2D - ArtStation) Tom FALEMPIN (GDP - Portfolio) Alex LE ROY (GD - Portfolio) Marie ORGONASI (GA 3D - Portfolio) Martin PARET (GA 2D - ArtStation) Alexis PERRAULT (GDP - Portfolio) Gaëtan PLANTEGENEST (GA 2D - ArtStation) Alexandre RAUMEL (GDP - Portfolio) Clément RIGAUX (GA 3D - ArtStation) Hugo TEYSSIER (GDP - Portfolio) Max THIENOT (GD - Portfolio) Eloïse VREL (GD - Portfolio)
